OMG, this is a nightmare!!!  Imagine that you return to the hotel and want to shower and go to sleep, but you have to wait for a bad attitude handyman come fix the broken faucet for you. review.title: Great hotel near freeway

We stayed five nights in the hotel.  Overall the room is clean and quiet at night.  Very windy because it is ocean front.  No facility in the nearby area make it a very isolated hotel.  Not very convenient for grocery shopping or dinning.  Other than that not much to complain.
review.positiveRemarks: Room is spacial and next to the sea.

review.title: Very nice hotel in South San Francisco.
review.reviewText: This is our second time staying at the Double Tree Hotel and our stay was great.  We had a room with a king size bed and a view of the Marina.  The hotel is in South San Francisco and away from the hustle and bustle of the city,  but that's what we wanted.  Driving into the city on a daily basis wasn't a problem at all because the city itself is relatively small (approximately 7 miles by 7 miles).  Our room was very clean, the decor was nice and modern, the front staff was friendly during check in, and housekeeping was great and accommodated our requests.  There wasn't any issue finding parking when we came back to the hotel in the evenings and we stayed during Memorial Day holiday week.  The bed and the pillows were a little soft for my taste, but this is the usual situation at all hotels I've stayed in.  I would stay at this hotel again when visiting San Francisco in the future.
review.positiveRemarks: The location.  We wanted a quieter location away from the city.
review.negativeRemarks: Firmer pillows and beds.  A microwave in the room would come in handy.
review.locationRemarks: It's in South San Francisco but there really aren't any restaurants, malls, etc. nearby since it's located in a business park.

review.title: Relaxing
review.reviewText: The room was extremely comfortable.  Relaxing interior design.  Superb service.  I originally booked 1 King bed online, but only two queens were available.  The very clean, prestine room made up for the mishap.  Love the chocolate chip cookies.

review.title: shockingly one of the nicest hotels!
review.reviewText: I have had to stay at many hotels in the area for work, and this hotel was by far one of the nicest rooms I had the experience to stay in! It was even a better room than the grand Hyatt room I stayed in. An extremely comfortable bed, a great layout of modern decorations with high tech electronics that even came to my rescue as I lost my iPhone charger and I was still able to charge it via Ihome alarm clock radio with built in charger, A nice good size tv, coffee maker with actual liquid creamer cups, and coffee cups with to go tops. They just really nailed it for a nice experience. I would stay here at any time.

The hotel is equipped with a swimming pool and fitness center. The location is very strategic between San Francisco and San Jose (which are my destinations).
You have to drive to this hotel though, but it doesn't have parking fee like any other hotels. It is not walkable, but if you love to bike, there's a trail nearby.
Brisbane downtown was also great to walk through. it has a lot of small, local stores and it is located on the hill which has a great view.

review.title: 'Double Tree SFO'
review.reviewText: While we could see the marina, the view was limited to less than 15% of the overall view.  The majority of the view was the parking lot and the building and roof top next door.  The room was very nice with a refrigerator, but no microwave.  Refrigerator could get to 41 degrees F, but no colder.  The heating cooling unit was one of those wall units, not the nicer central HVAC type units.  Fan was very loud, but thankfully it could be adjusted to 'low' and to come on 'automatically.'  A lot of these type units are either 'ON' or 'OFF.'  So this was a nice option.  Not as nice as the central HVAC, but nicer than just 'ON' or 'OFF' at most hotels.  Staff was very friendly, and there was plenty of parking.  Nicely situated near the SFO and the rental car return area.  Overall, I would stay here again.
review.negativeRemarks: Microwave.
review.locationRemarks: Near US 101, near SFO, and nicely located outside of Daley City.

In our case we had family and I called the hotel  couple of days prior to ensure we have adjacent rooms, was told booking on same last name always has adjacent rooms. When we arrived, got 1 room on 5th floor and another on 7th. On mentioning about my call, they said there is no record of such a call. Finally we got 2 rooms on the same floor but had to change 1 room from 2 queens to a king to get rooms on the same floor.

review.title: Excellent choice for a San Franciso getaway!
review.reviewText: Overall great stay at the hotel. The front desk was extremely helpful and accommodating. The restaurant team were inviting and great with services. We will definitely stay again.

review.title: Quiet restful location
review.reviewText: I stayed 4 nights and it was a great experience. My bay view room was a quiet haven after spending my days exploring in and around the SF Bay area.  There were a couple of maintenance issues in my room that needed attention but the staff responded quickly and courteously. After I reported the second issue I was offered the option to change rooms, but because the issue was able to be resolved I chose to keep the room I was in. Hey, stuff happens, but how they responded was great and really only added to my appreciation of this property. They have an onsite restaurant with in-room service. The food was all so good. There is also a quiet marina very close by with a large parking area that was great for catching beautiful views of the bay and a couple of gorgeous sunrises!  Do yourself a favor and stay here. If I'm ever in the Bay area again I would not hesitate to book here for another stay!

review.title: Our Second Stay
review.reviewText: We loved the first time we stayed here so we decided to stay here again and we were not disappointed. The staff was very helpful and the accommodated us by going above and beyond. They used to have microwaves in rooms but this time they had been removed so we were a bit displeased. When we mentioned this to the staff, they immediately got one setup in our room making our 4 night stay more convenient.
review.positiveRemarks: Warm cookies on check in and checkout, always welcoming and helpful staff
review.negativeRemarks: Finding a parking spot could be difficult sometimes but the neighboring property Home-wood suites allows parking for Double Tree.

Cons: limited parking (there was a construction crew using the hotel across the parking lot and their vehicles took up most of the parking).  However, the front desk staff came out and helped us find a parking spot!

review.title: GREAT HOTEL EXPERIENCE
review.reviewText: We did not have any idea where to stay in San Francisco, where the hotels are so expensive, charge for parking, and other hidden charges.  We decided on the Hilton because of its name, and we were so happy with the entire stay.  It is a little harder to find, but once there, everything is great.  The cookies are so good, they have a restaurant and a bar right there, and they are on the water.  The rooms are so comfortable and clean.  The staff is great.  Stay here and you will not be disappointed.
review.positiveRemarks: The water, the cleanliness and friendliness, the cookies, and the convenience of having everything you need right in one building.  Great
review.negativeRemarks: Just the location is a little difficult to find, but that cannot be helped, and in San Francisco the traffic is so fast-moving.
review.locationRemarks: It is close to the airport, and they have free shuttle service; they are also on the water, which makes for a beautiful setting.

review.title: Quality, close to airport
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. Here's an example of why I liked the staff: During check in they were giving away two free cookies (as a Halloween treat, because it was right before Halloween). I told them I couldn't eat the cookies because of a wheat allergy, so instead they gave me two vouchers to use at their bar. So I got two free glasses of wine! That was a nice surprise, especially because most of the "free" food at hotels is useless to me because I can't eat it. Room was very large and well taken care of. Good air system, marble counters (not that this matters, but it gives you an idea of the quality of the place). Used the gym and I was happy with it. I would definitely stay here again if it were a little cheaper. I stayed here after getting a last-minute deal so it WAS a great deal to get this hotel for $87/night. I would probably even pay more to stay here because it was very nice, quiet and comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: The mini fridge was set to 42 degrees which was a little too warm for refrigerating food. Lower the temp in the fridges.

review.reviewText: Got a cookie when we checked in and the place was super nice (: Very Vegas style

review.title: Very nice and comfortable hotel.
review.reviewText: Very nice hotel. Only downfall is the access to the hotel from the freeway.
Great stay! Comfortable and clean, staff was friendly and we enjoyed our stay here
It was great. Hotel staff was very nice. Restaurant was good

review.title: room cleanliness, room comfort , hotel staff nice
review.reviewText: great price for this hotel, nice area, hotel room comfort, room cleanliness, check in fast and staff great

review.title: Close to airport.  Helpful staff.
review.reviewText: Stayed on our last night in San Francisco.  It was close to the airport.  Comfortable room and friendly staff!

review.title: Transit to Argentina
review.reviewText: Where my family and I were concerned and excellent. I was short on transit time in the metro S.F. area and needed a hotel close to the airport. This was a perfect choice. My family and I enjoyed the restaurant as they were continuing on with their trip. The check in was quick. I needed transportation at 3 a.m. and it was provided for. The welcoming cookies my grandchildren got were excellent. A little crispy on the edges but good. The reception personnel were most kind and courteous. I would go back to this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: The room was ample, quiet and quite comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: No kitchen personnel in Tank Tops with shoulders & exposed armpits and Flip Flops and hanging hair in food prep area.

review.title: room service
review.reviewText: arrived late so ordered a couple of burgers and fries for kids. food was ok but no condiments..asked waiter and received an oh well look. you would think for twenty seven bucks for two children burgers thats a no brainer. stayed at several double trees and first time had negative experience.

review.title: Great hotel close enough to tourist places
review.reviewText: So pleased with our stay at the Doubletree Hotel while we were in SF to do some sightseeing. I didn't want to spend more staying in town next to all the touristy attractions. This hotel was a great price while still being close enough to use the Muni to Fisherman's Wharf, Alcatraz, Chinatown and The Ferry Building. Loved the chocolate cookies upon arrival! The staff wasn't exceptional (asked them for help with the shuttle schedule and where attractions were located) but the rooms were clean and comfortable which was all we needed after a day of walking around. We will stay here again.
review.locationRemarks: We used the airport shuttle to get to the Muni station and went to all the touristy attractions.

review.reviewText: Everything was great except for the beds. They were really hard, I stayed for 3 days and sleeping on the beds was a horrible experience.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel.....too far from stores for incidentals.

review.title: Great location for a walk, but not shopping!
review.reviewText: Work trip in SF, so the location where pretty good and relaxing!
review.positiveRemarks: Nice area for a nice walk or run

review.reviewText: Quiet, well maintained, friendly staff, free shuttle to and from SFO

review.title: Nice Place to Stay for Good Price in San Francisco
review.reviewText: The hotel is located in a good view, close to the water.  It really close to the San Francisco airport.  The staff is nice, and the price is reasonable.  The only problem is the parking at night.  There are so many cars, so it's quite difficult to find a spot to park at night.

review.title: Nice hotel away from traffic
review.reviewText: Quiet hotel in a commercial area near a bay. I requested a roll portable bed for my 2 year old and refused

review.title: Nice, Clean, Comfortable...
review.reviewText: It's less than 10mi from the city, great location, close to airport, bay view, free parking, fast free internet (wifi), friendly staff from house cleaning to restaurant, nice room, comfortable mattress and pillows. What more can one ask for?
Had a wonderful stay..lovely hotel..staff were nice and friendly.

review.title: Great hotel close enough to san Francisco without
review.reviewText: Great hotel, check in wasn't very warm took my money and said here's your room keys. There where hairs in the shower. Beds where great!! Over all nice place to stay.

review.title: Amazing staff
review.reviewText: You try not get your expectations just in case the staff is rude or the room is not clean and u justify what you spent keeping these things in mind but this place was amazing very accommodating, Amazing staff. Even though I stayed for only one night the atmosphere here was very welcoming.  Definitely will stay here again in the future
It was great. service was very helpful and rooms were very clean and well appointed.
Best in room coffee I've ever had. Ended up needing an extra night and was no problem and was able to keep same room. Awesome place!!

review.title: Horrible experience
review.reviewText: I had left a gold pendant given to me from my grandmother on the edge of the tub right before my short flight to LA. I had forgot it, called hotel after (not even that much time after) and let them know and even though no one checked into that room and employee stated room hasn't been clean yet , she tells me there is nothing there. I know for a fact I left it there accidentally. When I kept calling hotel, they were not helpful and just seemed aggravated I was calling instead of looking into it.  I would not trust this place with belongings.

review.title: Good San Francisco Airport Hotel.
review.reviewText: My husband and I only stayed because we had a 6 AM fight.  The hotel is really nice, and I would choose it for a longer stay.  The only negative was the airport shuttle not leaving on time.  It was supposed to leave at 4:30 AM, but didn't arrive until 4:45 AM.  This is critical when checking in for a flight.
review.positiveRemarks: I liked the atmosphere and appearance.  I liked the staff and their friendliness.
review.negativeRemarks: Making sure the airport shuttle leaves at the stated time.
review.locationRemarks: It's only 10 minutes from the airport.

review.title: Very nice, extremely comfortable hotel
review.reviewText: We booked two rooms for two days for our trip to SF.  It was about 15 minutes drive from the heart of the city but I loved that!  It was nice to retreat to a comfortable, quiet setting after the hustle and bustle of the city.  The rooms were very clean and the view was really beautiful.  The refrigerator and coffee maker in the room were very convenient.  While we didn't use room service, the prices were affordable, as were the prices in the downstairs restaurant.  The food was delicious and the service was very friendly and accommodating, even at 9:30pm.  The beds were comfortable with the thick down comforters with fluffy down pillows.  I would highly recommend this hotel and I would stay there again.
review.positiveRemarks: Comfort, cleanliness, great customer service, good views, quiet location
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Far enough away from the city to be relaxing, yet close enough to drive and enjoy the sights and sounds.

review.title: Great new and nice hotel.
review.reviewText: Hotel is really new and has a great location really close to downtown San Fran, about 12 min drive . Hotel comes with free parking and free wifi, I don't think any other hotel gives you service with like 4 star hotel.

review.title: Weekday Rates Skyrocket!
review.reviewText:
Why is it that most hotels near SFO charge under $200 on weekends and that rates skyrocket to $290 on Monday - Thursday??  Enjoyed my weekend here; but had to find similar lower rates and move out to another nearby hotel for the next couple of  days.

This hotel, however, was very clean, comfortable, decent restaurant, but NOTHING else is located nearby w/in walking distance.  You need a car to get around.

review.title: Really Nice Stay
review.reviewText: Hotel is close to the airport,  which is nice, but further from tourist attractions (i.e. Golden Gate Bridge and park, Pier 39). Nice bay views. Breakfast room service was friendly and right on time; nice sized portions. I didn't like that room service left my leftover food outside room for more then a day.

review.title: Great stay in San Francisco
review.reviewText: Honestly, everything was great. The room was great, the clenliness of the room was spotless and location of the hotel was, in my opinion, great as well. I loved the location even if it was south of San Francisco I enjoyed how quiet the location was. The only thing that really disappointed me was the how rude a certain staff member was. I clocked in around early morning and wasn't really greeted. I thought maybe cause it was really late and he was just having a long day but no I was wrong. When I went to go talk to the same staff member about prolonging my stay the next night,  he didnt bother to look me in the eyes. He was staring straight at the computer and didn't acknowledge me at all. I felt uncomfortable.... I thought all the staff members were going to treat me the same until a certain front desk person turned it all around. He gave me the excellent service that doubletree withheld. I was shocked in a sense because it was totally different from the other front desk person. That was the only problem during my stay, other than that, everything else was great.

review.title: an awesome hotel
review.reviewText: A cosy, strategically location hotel in between SFO and downtown SF. The staff were informative and extremely helpful. Rooms, facilities and amenities were 4.5🌟s.

review.title: Hotel is decent, but avoid the restaurant
review.reviewText:
We liked the hotel.  The room was nice and clean.  The front desk had a bit of an attitude.
What you need to avoid in this hotel is the restaurant...poor selection, exorbitant prices, and extremely slow service...Don't go there.
review.positiveRemarks: Great location, clean and spacious room...Great gym, even though small.
review.negativeRemarks: Ventilation in the bathroom.  Better and cheaper menu in the restaurant.
review.locationRemarks: Well situated.  Close to the airport and to the city.

review.title: Nice hotel just outside of San Francisco
review.reviewText: Hotel was clean and comfortable, pool was indoor and great for the kids.

review.title: Awesome hotel
review.reviewText: It was very close to all the places we wanted to go, I would definitely stay there again

review.title: What a DoubleTree Should Be!
review.reviewText:
More for the money.  Room was large, comfortable, clean and quiet.  Everything we needed - more than we wanted.  

The Pier was only a short (if there was no traffic) drive away.

Restaurant was very nice with very good food.
review.positiveRemarks: Cleanliness, affordability and quiet.  Love the quiet.
review.negativeRemarks: Shower was confusing and leaky….the ac thermostat quirky….
review.locationRemarks: Pier 39 only a short drive away - if there were no traffic issues….were a few restaurants near by but closed too early.  Anything else near by?

review.title: It was ok, but I was expecting more
review.reviewText: Expecting more from the staff specially at from desk.

review.title: Nice and quiet hotel
review.reviewText: We were there for 3 nights, and it was great. Did not have any issue.

review.title: Nice hotel, well priced but you must have a car
review.reviewText: This hotel us about 10 km from downtown and near nothing other than other mid range hotels and the airport. So you must have a car...and parking is free. It took us 10 to 30 minutes to get downtown depending on time of day. The rooms are large, well appointed, clean. Great for a base for driving around the city with the family.

review.title: Far from DT
review.reviewText: Little bit far from downtown but the hotel is clean people are great

review.title: Nice hotel perfect for traveling
review.reviewText: convenient location, easy to check in, and the bed is very comfortable. The room temperature is easy to control.

review.title: Disappointing Double Tree
review.reviewText: Figured with a name like Doubletree and getting charged full price it would be safe to expect a quality stay! This place is way way past due for a major renovation!
review.negativeRemarks: Needs major facelift !!!!

review.title: Close to airport
review.reviewText: Wonderful cool fresh strawberry/orange flavored water at check in.  Great service to and from the airport.  Quiet and a nice view of a marina.

review.title: Excellent hotel!
review.reviewText: An excellent hotel, located right off the 101 freeway and about a 10 minute drive to downtown San Francisco.  The staff was friendly and courteous and check-in was fast and included a delicious complimentary cookie.  The room and bathroom were clean and spacious.  The complimentary coffee and tea in the room was also a bonus.  Overall the hotel was very nice and very comfortable.  I would definitely book again!
review.positiveRemarks: The easy access to the 101 freeway was great.  I didn't have to go through a maze of streets to get to the freeway.
review.negativeRemarks: I really can't think of any improvement that would be necessary.
review.locationRemarks: The location is perfect. About 10 minutes away from San Francisco.  Once in San Francisco there is plenty to do in that beautiful city.

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Nice hotel, great staff, but indoor pool was very cold.

review.title: Beautiful hotel. Couldn't ask for anything more.
review.reviewText: We had a very enjoyable experience at this hotel. It's close enough to the city (SF) yet far enough to be calm and relaxing. All staff were helpful and friendly. Only recommendation would be to allow drink servant the pool. That's one amenity I look for. Overall, this is an excellent place to park your boots for a night or two!!

review.title: Quiet and shuttle service was great
review.reviewText: Great staff, room was clean and bed was comfortable. Hotel was quiet during our stay. Not a lot going on but short drive for food if you do not want to eat at hotel. We used shuttle service to get to Bart and go into the city. That was a nice not having to worry about getting around downtown in your vehicle.

review.title: Best hotel I've been to in a long time.
review.reviewText: The staff were incredibly nice and service was always with a smile.  The room was very comfortable and spacious.  Breakfast was amazing.  If I'm ever in the area again I'm definitely booking there...not one complaint here.

review.title: Accused of taking items
review.reviewText: I was charged a blanket and pillow fee. I never taken anything from a hotel. Monica at the front desk said the $50.00 fee was for a deposit. She was very rude! Monica needs customer service training.

review.title: Great customer service!
review.reviewText: Awesome staff. Location perfect, not a far drive from airport, downtown San Fran and Palo Alto. Rooms are good, free parking.

review.title: Nice Hotel
review.reviewText: The Hotel is nice, but de pool is not good for me, I think so the Hotel need other pool more big and a best Restaurant menu.
review.positiveRemarks: I like the room, very confort.
review.locationRemarks: The location is good. The hotel is near the airport and has a very  nice view but not enjoy it because the  offered me a room with this view.

review.title: Excellent stay
review.reviewText: We stayed there to start our trip and end the trip, ease of the shuttle and super clean hotel with excellent service!   Very child friendly with indoor pool/spa while it is chilly in San Francisco.   We booked our last day before catching the plane because the beds were super comfy, very clean and convenient!
review.positiveRemarks: We like the rooms- beds and bathrooms.   The bar area was relaxing.   The pool/spa was quiet.  Overall we enjoyed both of our stays.
review.negativeRemarks: Our waiter had a challenging evening, but once we got our food- it was excellent!
review.locationRemarks: Very convenient and close to airport.   As it is off one of the main roads, it is convenient to get to downtown areas of San Francisco

review.reviewText: Great place to stay. Nice room and view. Easy parking. Staff is very friendly. Welcome cookies were just awesome.
Convenient location, free parking and wifi were nice bonuses. We enjoyed our stay :)
Great place to stay. Very courteous staff. Awesome lobby. Room was very spacious.
Nice hotel with good view. Good location. Welcoming staff.

review.title: Nice stay
review.reviewText: Not as per hotel name standard,many things could be better,had to ask for the toiletries n no microwave was there.
review.negativeRemarks: Ammenties

review.title: nice hotel close to airport
review.reviewText: Hotel exceeded my expection and room condition was great. Only thing not good was no complementary breakfast. Good hotel overall

review.title: Nice hotel. Close to downtown
review.reviewText: Nice place only complaint is that there was mildew in the grout of the shower.
Just stayed the night, good deal, kids had fun, rms are nice

review.title: If travelling very good location
review.reviewText: Conveniently located close to the airport, and not too far from down town SF
review.positiveRemarks: The room was clean and comfortable

review.reviewText: Clean and attractive facilities. Close to airport but not far from downtown San Francisco. Very reasonable price for the area.

Parts of the hotel were being renovated and the restaurant was closed for renos as well, which wasn't mentioned when we made the booking. The front entrance was closed, so we had to enter through the rear door. The second night, we had to move floors because there was someone smoking. The first time we called the front desk, someone came up and sprayed air freshener. The second time we called down, they moved us to another floor. They gave us tickets for an upgraded buffet breakfast and vouchers for a free drink to try to make up for the disruption. Did I mention the bar and restaurant were closed for renos? EVERYONE was given a free breakfast buffet and complimentary drinks in the evening. The day before we were to leave, the restaurant re-opened, so at least we were able to use some of the coupons. The morning we were checking out, we couldn't find my husband's passport anywhere. We ripped the room and our luggage apart trying to find it. Turns out we had left it in the first room and someone found it. It was at the front desk but no one had called us to let us know.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff were friendly and tried to be accommodating. Room was clean and comfortable, and the bed was awesome, sooooo comfortable.
review.negativeRemarks: Lobby could be cleaner, food could be better, breakfast food was not great. Also, coffee could be much better.
review.locationRemarks: Hotel has shuttle to the airport and BART station, which was convenient.

review.title: Reasonable.
review.reviewText: The bed was comfortable in the room but the shower knob in the bathroom was missing or broken off. The hotel had construction going on in the restaurant. No continental breakfast provided.

The room is comfortable and clean.  The refrigerator came in handy for our multi-night stay.  The walls could use a little more insulation as we were able to, at times, hear the adjacent occupants laughing and enjoying their conversations when it got louder.

review.title: Nice hotel close to the airport.
review.reviewText: Convenient for someone traveling on business. Close to the airport and the city.

review.title: Very nice
review.reviewText: Great experience. nice location. Staff treated us fine.

review.title: Family trip
review.reviewText: Not a single complaint. Hotel staff was great super friendly. Check in and check out was super easy. Hotel room was really clean and comfortable. Would definitely book again.

review.title: Worked out Great!
review.reviewText:
We were very pleased with our recent stay here, as it's close to the airport (the hotel shuttle runs perfectly according to its schedule), and close to our family in S San Fran.  The staff was very helpful and friendly, and the restaurant is clean and has really good food and service.  We will definitely stay here again
!
review.positiveRemarks: Has a restaurant/bar and the hotel shuttle to the airport runs perfectly on-time!  Also, the staff is very accommodating.

review.title: Great hotel.
review.reviewText: From front desk to the room everything went good.

review.title: great place to stay when going to a ball game.
review.reviewText: everybody was so friendly...the bar and resturant  need more personality and update..
review.positiveRemarks: the staff, the help,everyone said hi,hello, can i help you!  everyone made us feel so welcome!!!!
review.negativeRemarks: the food menue was limited. make it more like a real resturant. let us sit down and order a little or a lot. bacon and eggs or coffee and a sweet roll
review.locationRemarks: went to a ball game and dinner in the city.

review.reviewText: Doubletree accommodated an early check in which was very helpful. Landed early morning into San Francisco and took shuttle at 10 am. Was able to check in to room at 11 am. Staff was extremely nice .

review.title: Convenient location
review.reviewText: Had a restful night. The staff was helpful. Room was clean, and spacious.

review.title: Quiet and clean
review.reviewText: Good stay, convenient location, friendly staff, good price. View of the bay!

review.title: Reasonably priced hotel near San Francisco.
review.reviewText: Duringy recent stay, I enjoyed a room that was clean, comfortable, and welcoming staff. I didnt have any complaints. The bed is very comfortable, and the cookies they give you upon check in are great! For the price, I have no problem recommending this hotel for my in laws.

review.title: Nice hotel near USF
review.reviewText: The staff was very welcoming and we enjoyed the yummy cookies at check in!
review.positiveRemarks: Easy access to the freeway and San Francisco.
review.locationRemarks: Visited San Francisco.

review.title: Adequate with one exception
review.reviewText: Perfectly fine airport hotel. But the desk lamps worked like torture devices. All glare.
review.negativeRemarks: Get new desk lamps.
review.locationRemarks: Go on an airplane.

review.title: Very nice stay
review.reviewText: Very friendly staff greeted me at check in. I made the mistake of going to the other Doubletree by the airport first and their staff wasnt near as friendly! The room was very clean and comfy, would consider staying there again in the future.

review.title: Nice hotel and good location.
review.reviewText: The room was spacious, clean and quiet.  The beds were very comfortable.  Enjoyed our stay and will recommend this hotel to family and friends.

review.title: Great Find!
review.reviewText: We were going to a concert in San Francisco, but did not want to pay the high hotel  prices.  So we stayed here and shuttled from the hotel for free to SFO Airport to the BART station.  We paid $9 to take the BART to the Powell Station.  From there we walked or taxied around town.  After the concert, we took a cab back to the hotel for $22! This hotel is so convenient, but also the room was so clean, modern, comfortable, and quiet.  We had a beauitiful view, too.  We received a nice upgrade to the 8th floor, as well.  For $134?  Are you kidding me?  We will be back and could not be happier.  A great property!
review.positiveRemarks: Proximity to SFO and BART, cleanliness, modern and comfortable, friendly staff, and quiet location.
review.negativeRemarks: I cannot find one thing they can improve upon-this place is the best.
review.locationRemarks: The location is quiet and beautiful.  Staying in San Francisco is terribly expensive with sirens sounding all night.  Not here! Close to SFO and BART

review.title: Close to SFO and comfortable.
review.reviewText: The room was nice and clean, beds were comfortable, and room was stylish.
review.negativeRemarks: There could be more tv channels I guess.

review.title: 3 nite stay
review.reviewText: Newly renovated, modern and comfy .... Staff very friendly.... Free parking and only 20 mins from downtown

review.title: weekend in Brisbane, CA
review.reviewText: The hotel was on the water. it was very peaceful.  Great staff and excellent service.
review.positiveRemarks: the location by the water and conveniently located to the airport and amenities, shuttle service and a restaurant and bar in the lobby.
review.negativeRemarks: I would have like a microwave in the room. but other than that...it was perfect.
review.locationRemarks: close to the airport, restaurants, a wonderful deli, shopping malls and a shuttle service

review.title: Overall wonderful
review.reviewText: The room was VERY NICE, clean and comfortable.  We received a hot cookie when we checked in and that was wonderful touch. We had dinner at the restaurant there and the waiter didn't seem to be listening to our request and brought me the wrong drink and didn't bring us what we asked for.  The food was good and the other waiters seem to be attentive to their guest so I am not knocking the hotel for that.  There was no ice on our floor, but it wasn't a big inconvenience for us, but would have been nice.  The shuttle drivers were very nice and staff was helpful.  If you are looking to go to the city from BART from the SF airport it does take some time but I was ok with not having to drive there.  Just plan accordingly-give yourself a couple of hours depending on where you want to go.  Overall the place was beautiful and I would definitely stay there again.
review.negativeRemarks: Offer more food choices and not so high prices, since they are the only place to eat if you can't travel out late.
review.locationRemarks: It seem like nothing was "near" by, you would have had to drive somewhere more than 10 mins.

review.title: From rocklin
review.reviewText: My stay was excellent! Staff very friendly & helpful. Service exceptional!! Very happy. Very satisfied with my choice!
Fresh renovation made this a comfortable and convenient airport hotel.  Excellent service in the restaurant.

review.title: Beautiful View, friendly Staff
review.reviewText:
From the moment I walked in I was impressed.  Very friendly staff, food was wonderful and the views of the marinas were beautiful.  Location to the airport is what will always bring me back 
Thanks for everything
review.locationRemarks: Very close to San Fran Airport great walking trail close by

review.title: Soaking wet carpet and smelly
review.reviewText: The room had a bad smell and on further investigation we discovered the carpet around the air conditioner was soaking wet. We arrived very late with small children and the only option was to pack back up and move to another room or stay where we were, so frustrating.

review.title: Close to downtown easy access
review.reviewText: Nice room and good bar and restaurant. Rate is kind of high for most business travelers expense budgets.
review.negativeRemarks: Kind of Expensive. This would be a top notch deal if the rate was around $150 per night instead of $219. I would stay here every time at that rate.
review.locationRemarks: Location was great. Was there on business

review.title: good hotel！
review.reviewText: Relatively new, heat didn't work, I was so cold in the room. Breakfast was delicious, near the harbor very good view nearby

review.title: Exemplary stay...
review.reviewText:
Nothing could have been better.  1 minor concern.  Asked for a pitcher of room service.  Charged me for 2 glasses of tea ($8) which I took offense to.
That is my perception of what that 32oz drink would have cost if I were in the restaurant which was $4 for the single as it had free refills.

Again, VERY MINOR.  Just a thought.

Front desk staff was Excellent for every interaction with them.  So friendly and accommodating!!!

Great / excellent visit.  TY.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing.  That is a concern.  This is truly a hotel that is designed for conventions that are within walking distance.  Not a big deal. Just thought.

review.title: Last stop
review.reviewText: Just stayed one night to catch an early, early flight.  Very comfortable and quiet.  Staff was extremely helpful and friendly.  Nice!

We had an excellent comfortable stay. The hotel is very close to the city and it took us literally minutes to drive north on 101 freeway to the SoMa neighbourhood. I will definitely stay at this hotel again next time.
Great time, convenient to airport. Clean, comfortable.
review.positiveRemarks: Shuttle into the airport and to the BART - so convenient.

review.title: First trip to SF
review.reviewText: It was an excellent choice, near to the airport and maximum 10 min to SF downtown.

review.title: I liked the comfort.
review.reviewText: It was a nice experience and a great weekend stayed at this hotel specially for my boys who enjoyed the gym and the pool. Thanks for your hospitality!  Bye.

review.title: Great customer service
review.reviewText: Fast and easy check-in and friendly staff! Rooms are great and clean! Love the easy Wi-Fi connection and Free Parking!

review.title: Close to fwys very convenient
review.reviewText: Stuff is very attentive great atmosphere great service

review.title: The hotel staff was wonderful.
review.reviewText: The staff went to great lengths to make our stay pleasant and enjoyable!

review.title: Close to the airport.
review.reviewText:
The shuttle buses from the airport are great, but are not clearly marked. Initially I ended up getting on the bus for doubletree for Burlingame, but the driver was nice and fast enough to catch the other bus and get me in the right direction.

The front desk staff was very nice and helpful, offering a warm cookie, and suggestions for dining in the area as well as hotel amenities, though there was no mention of Wifi. I left and went to my room, to find that neither of the electric keys would work. When I went back down, I was behind someone that was checking in and the same clerk was telling that person about the free wifi. I got a new set of keys to another room, and the rest was without incident. I was on one of the HHonors floors which gives you nothing really more other than seasoned travelers that make less noise at night and a free newspaper at your door in the morning.

The room was nice, if old, but clean and reasonably modern, furnishings, but the TV had no guide and so-so picture quality, and the AC unit was fussy to use and quite noisy. Overall though these are very minor issues.

I would consider staying again. Had I not had issues with the keycards and the desk staff not mentioning the wifi, I would have rated 5 stars.
review.positiveRemarks: Close to airport, reasonably clean inside.
review.negativeRemarks: Shuttle buses can be marked clearer.

review.reviewText: for a $99 hotel, I got way more than I expected. Clean room, nice pool and hot tub. Draw back is the waiter at restaurant, some of then not friendly and act ruld.

review.title: Very comfortable airport hotel, would stay again
review.reviewText:
It was excellent a the way through from check in to check out.
For people transiting through SFO, can't think of a better choice for the price.

review.title: Good view of San Fransico bay.
review.reviewText: The airport shuttle was in time and quick. The staff was rude and acted like they had something better to do than talk to you. Rooms were clean and well equipped. A decent stay but because of the staff's attitude I will not be back.

review.title: Nice stay but noisy
review.reviewText: The hotel was a good stay and we were even welcomed with a couple of freshly baked biscuits. Staff were professional and the room was comfortable. We just had a couple of issues with noisy people in the room next to us due to the walls not seeming to be very soundproof. We could hear our neighbours talking and coughing which didn't make for a great night's sleep. Our shower head also had an issue and would make a very loud constant sound after using it for a couple of minutes. Other than that, it was a very good stay.

review.title: Great place to stay!
review.reviewText: The staff was nice and the rooms were clean. Will stay here again.

review.title: Comfortable Hotel
review.reviewText: Great hotel. About 30 min away from the city. Had a good experience. Loved that the parking was included. We also ate at the restaurant in the hotel food wasn't too bad. Only down fall was that if you wanted to go out to grab something to eat or get some coffee somewhere else everything was a bit far not to convenient. But I would stay here again. Good place.

review.title: Relarively close to SF downtown at an affordable p
review.reviewText: The room is spacious enough, clean and comfortable exept A/C which is very noisy while it is on.
review.positiveRemarks: Affordable price at a location close to SF downtoen.

review.title: Great Hotel.
review.reviewText: Great Hotel... Helpfull staff, clean, confy, in great condition, great parking system, vending machines, etc.
review.positiveRemarks: As I said, great hotel... it is not your conventional design of hotel, hallways are a little narrow... that pops to attention when you go in.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast, may be the season, but trying to serve yourself some breakfast is like going to battle!
review.locationRemarks: B ave stayed at some HIE in the area, and this one is better located regarding gas stations and fast food restaurants.

review.title: Dirty

Great stay. Close to the city and airport. Delicious cookies at check in and check out.

review.title: clean, great.

Excellent conditions, very friendly staff, will definitely return.

review.title: Great stop after a long flight

review.title: Hotel near airport

review.title: Very good value for the money!
review.reviewText:
Dining staff were excellent - very courteous and professional - and food was very good.  However, selection was limited.

Bed was very comfortable.

Self parking was adequate
review.positiveRemarks:
Food and beverage service

Bed and linens were very comfortable
review.negativeRemarks: Broader menu selection in dining room
review.locationRemarks: Location was very good - less than 30 minutes to Fisherman's Wharf and GG Bridge.  We visited wine country in Sonoma and Napa - about 90 minutes away

review.title: It was a wonderful hotel and I would recommend it

review.positiveRemarks: the soft beds and large rooms
review.negativeRemarks: cheaper rate.
review.locationRemarks: airport

review.title: Quick stay before the holidays
review.reviewText: We flew in right after our wedding and was happy to see a comfy bed after a long day! We received champagne and a lava cake with a note from the hotel! Lovely place to stay and we will be coming back to vist again!

review.title: Great hotel, just not at airport
review.reviewText: We booked for a quick overnight. Our flight got us in after their shuttle stopped running, to our surprise. We were not happy about the $25 cab ride. But the bed pretty much made up for it.

review.title: An OK stay...
review.reviewText: Check in was fast and easy.  they provided me with a shuttle schdule and a warm cookie :0) The bed was very comfortable.  The service at the bar/ resturant was excellent.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel staff was very friendly.  The shuttle was great and on time !!!
review.negativeRemarks: The carpet and the microwave were old. The parking overnight was free.  There is a fee for airport parking.

review.title: Welcomed like a friend!
review.reviewText: It's nice to be greeted with a cookie at check in after a long trip:) The staff was very friendly. A front desk person was even nice enough to bend the rules to give me a bottle of water when I didn't have my wallet on me. It's the little things that make a stay more comfortable. The room was also very comfy. Thank you for a relaxing stay!
review.negativeRemarks: My Uber took me to wrong Doubletree first. The Expedia listing title could be more clear.
review.locationRemarks: Great for staying close to the airport for an early flight. You can take a cab/Uber to the BART station to get to the city.

review.title: Enjoyed this hotel
review.reviewText:
We typically book hotels in this area due to the prices compared to staying in the city. Only a 15 minute drive to SF. This hotel is clean, comfortable and good all around deal. Check in was quick and the young lady who helped me was very friendly and efficient. Our room was on the 7th floor with a nice view of the marina. There was work being done on the top floor above us but we were forewarned by the receptionist and it was not a problem. Room is equipped with a coffee maker and microwave. Also a roll of paper towels which is actually a nice touch.  The only issue I had was the water pressure but I've noticed this at other hotels in the area so I can't fault the hotel. Also parking seems a bit limited although we did find what may have been the last spot upon returning Saturday night.  
One thing to mention, if you are coming from SF you actually have to pass the hotel southbound 101 and then take the 101 north to get to the exit.

review.title: Very nice hotel, good staf
review.reviewText: Everything was as expected or better. The only area for improvement would be the bar service.  The bar was not busy and the one bartender seemed to have a lot on his plate.  My suggestion would be or him to look at each patron more often, then the patrons would not have to shout out to get his attention.
review.positiveRemarks: Very clean everywhere.  Bell man Danny was very helpful.

review.reviewText: Awesome place, clean, friendly, and affordable. A close drive to attractions.

review.title: Away from the city...but close enough
review.reviewText: Just a few minutes to the city.  We were able to get away from the fast paced city and TRAFFIC.  The views were beautiful.  The room and facilities were clean, we also had a swim in the indoor pool, very clean.  You can request a DVD and game console for in-room family fun. You will have to drive to find restaurants and stores, but only 2-5 miles south on the 101.  Will definitely spend the night here again!
review.locationRemarks: Get on the 101 south and within 2-5 miles you find everything you need as far as restaurants, stores and even a shopping center.

review.reviewText: It was a pleasant experience from the very beginning. Staff was so friendly and welcoming. Rooms were very comfortable and a perfect distance to everywhere we wanted to go in SF. Didn't have to deal with crazy traffic, which was definitely a plus!
Close to SFO which is the only reason we chose this hotel.
review.negativeRemarks: hotel restaurant service was horrible. Food might have been mediocre had it been prepared properly.

review.title: Hard to get to coming from san jose
review.reviewText: Hotel stay started out ok but quickly turned into a nightmate some one from the hotel accused us of smoking which we did not and charged us extra will never stay here again

review.title: Nice hotel with a nice view of a lake
review.reviewText: I enjoyed the hotel stay, however there wasn't enough parking for the guest and we had to park three buildings away and walk back late at night. That is my only complaint I just feel they should have better parking for their guests.

review.title: San Francisco Stay
review.reviewText: The stay at this hotel was very nice.  The 3:00 check in time is a little late when you are out by the airport as there is nothing to do in the area without shuttling into Downtown San Francisco.
review.negativeRemarks: The pillows were too soft and had no support.
review.locationRemarks: The location is excellent if you have an early flight.

review.title: nice hotel near the airport and sea
review.reviewText: nice price，good eviroment，beautiful hotel，amazing people，that's all

review.title: Perfect night
review.reviewText: Perfect hotel. Close to the highway to San Francisco and Airport. Wonderful mattress. Overall a very nice stay.

review.title: Excellent!
review.reviewText: Enjoyed my time in the hotel. Upon check-in, I was offered with cookies, which was amazing. Hotel room was great, complete with all amenities. Location was convenient, free parking and very close to the freeway. I was so pleased with my stay and I will definitely stay here again the next time I'll be in the Bay Area!

review.title: Service good - all facilities worked
review.reviewText: Shuttle bus picked us up - short 10 min ride to hotel. Reception welcoming. Room clean & comfortable. Service in resturaunt good & food reasonable. Used the shuttle service to access the BART train to CET to downtown SF.
review.locationRemarks:
In the middle of an office complex with no shops, bars or resturaunts nearby.

Small harbour area

review.title: Very nice and affordable!
review.reviewText:
This was a great alternative to staying in the city. There is a free shuttle to the airport where you can take BART into the city ($18 round trip to Powell St). 

My room was large, comfortable and clean. There is a nice walking trail along the bay that I used for early morning run's.

You do not need a car if you are just going to be doing the city. I got a car one day to drive north of San Francisco and was happy to find out the hotel didn't charge for parking.
review.positiveRemarks: It felt very safe. Rooms where clean, large and comfortable. Easy public transportation route into the city.
review.locationRemarks: There is a nice walking trail along the bay. Other than that there isn't much to do close by so go into the city.

review.title: Very clean with excellant linens and towels
review.reviewText: NIce price and very convenient to  the airport and downtown

review.title: Nice hotel close to the freeway. Easy access.
review.reviewText: Comfortable place to stay. Would recommend to everyone. Staff is very generous. Room is clean. Great amenities.

review.title: Nice hotel, clean and quiet.
review.reviewText: Great place to stay will definetly stay there again.

review.title: Decent, but in need of updates.
review.reviewText: We booked a King room through Expedia, but the hotel gave us two Queens. The hotel said that was the information that came through a third-party.
review.positiveRemarks: Offered a free shuttle to the airport and BART STATION.
review.negativeRemarks: Hotel was fine, but not outstanding. The room is in need of updates, although they will be starting a renovation soon.
review.locationRemarks: Berlouticcini's is a great restaurant.

review.reviewText:
Had a pretty bad experience here. The 'non smoking' room smelled strongly of cigarette smoke and the pillows had hair of them.
When I complained to the front desk, was told no other rooms were available. They did send up a guy to spray some air freshener around the room, which ended up making things worse. Were advised to leave the window open the whole night.

review.title: Perfect hotel for SAN Francisco area.
review.reviewText: nice comfy bed. easy h-way exit and entrance. You need a car to go to local restaurants. But, they are 3-5 minutes away, not a big of the deal. free breakfast would be ideal. I did not have any negative imprassion about this hotel.
review.positiveRemarks: Bed, HD tv, clean, refrigerator and microwave, free parking.
review.negativeRemarks: FREE BREAKFAST, OR AT LEAST RESONABLE PRICE.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing near by. But if you have a car, everything near by a few minutes.

review.title: Quiet hotel nice surrounding and breezy
review.reviewText:
We walked around the
Beach and a nearby Marina. Although is far from Mall but easy access by hotel shuttle bus to the airport. Then take the Bart Train to the city we had fun by commuting everyday.
review.positiveRemarks: Good location if you want a quieter place and close to the freeway.i
review.negativeRemarks: I think they need to put  drinks in the fridge and charge if they drink and refill depend how long the guest will stay.
review.locationRemarks: The location is good and if you like to go for a walk just across the beach.

review.title: Excellent stay
review.reviewText: Great place to stay near airport. Very great staff so helpful and friendly. Very clean!

review.title: Beautiful hotel, convenient to SFO.
review.reviewText: Everything went smooth. Check in and out was easy and the front desk staff were friendly and helpful. The hotel is very well maintained, very clean and decorated beautifully. The room was spacious and very comfortable. I was impressed with the additional amenities like a refrigerator and microwave. Good shower water pressure and the shower head was mounted high enough that you don't have to stoop to get under it.
review.positiveRemarks: Décor was very nice, cleanliness, water front views, room comfort.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing
review.locationRemarks: Very close to SFO airport. Easy on and off access to the freeway but far enough away that you don't get the freeway noise.

review.title: No Complaints

review.reviewText: Nice.  Like I said.  And now I'm saying it again.  And over again.  I wonder how many characters they require...

review.title: This is the way it should be.

review.positiveRemarks: Clean, well-run, quiet - even though it is on the expressway.
review.negativeRemarks: Nothing that I could see.
review.locationRemarks: The airport.

review.title: Nice hotel close to airport w iPhone 5 cradle

review.title: Worked out great for us.  Close to airport

review.negativeRemarks: Ride service to local concert venues. (We were there for McCartney)

review.title: Great location with a beautiful view of the marina
review.reviewText: Very clean and comfortable room with excellent view of the water.  Staff was vey courteous, and you can't beat the warm chocolate chip cookie at check-in.

review.title: Great Location
review.reviewText: Free shuttle to the airport, excellent service. Only issue we had was the walls were thin. We were able to hear the conversations of the people next door.  Beds were extra comfortable and the parking was free and convienent.
This hotel are Very expensive pleass low your prices

review.title: Reasonably priced, near airport

review.negativeRemarks: restaurant food was so-so, wait staff inattentive.  Wife asked for a water refill, the waiter filled hers and ignored my half full glass.
review.locationRemarks: so much to see and do in city, and downtown is only 8 miles away

review.title: Great hotel

review.title: Excelent location

review.title: Quality hotel with Quality service
review.reviewText: Room was clean and very comfortable.  Bed was fantastic.  Room had a good view of the bay and local marina.  The only possible negative is that it is in the middle of a business area so you need transportation to go to shops, restaurants, and convenience stores.  Nothing within walking distance.

review.title: Noche hotel near to AirPort
review.reviewText: Celan, confortable and only 15 minuetes yo the fishersman a wharf. Staff excellent and Rooms so confortables...

review.title: Enjoyed our stay
review.reviewText: We had 2 rooms as staying with family.  Very nice rooms, amenities were good and hotel staff were very helpful. Will recommend to friends and family and will stay here again if we visit. The hotel shuttle was very useful made travelling to and from the airport very easy.
review.positiveRemarks: Good rooms, amenities and friendly staff.

review.title: Hope it was an isolated experience
review.reviewText: It looked like a nice hotel, the staff was pleasant, but a noisy frig and chattering doors kept me up all night.  Good thing, since the 3:30 AM wakeup call I ordered never arrived. Might be an isolated incident. All I needed was a clean bed, some quiet and an early wake-up, I am not sure I would go back.

review.title: One of the best hotels we've stayed in
review.reviewText: Great room and staff.  It's one of those hotels where you'd rather stay and relax in the hotel than go out.
review.negativeRemarks: complimentary breakfast would nice
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco

review.title: BEST SF hotel!
review.reviewText: We had an amazing experience from the minute we checked in to the minute we checked out! Very friendly staff, exceptionally clean and quiet hotel, and fabulous food in the restaurant with first class service! I will stay here again and again! Don't hesitate to stay at this superior hotel!
Bad service, I hope that they give a chance to understand the resident issues

review.title: nice view of the bay and near a beach trail
review.reviewText: refrigerator  and microwave in room as well as several pillows and super comfortable bed. free wi fi. hot tub and pool but pool is pretty small. quiet.
review.negativeRemarks: its a little  expensive 110.00 with tax
review.locationRemarks: hotel shuttle a good perk

review.title: Pleasant hote
review.reviewText: Nice hotel which is convenient to both the airport and making your way into San Francisco.

review.title: Decent choice for visit to San Francisco
review.reviewText: We stayed here two nights, selecting this as a location less expensive than the hotels in the city, and close to SFO.  The room was pretty comfortable.  The bathroom was a bit strange - toilet so close to sink and vanity that it was more crowded than it needed to be.  Pool was cool in temp and only 3.5 ft deep or so, which disappointed our 10 yr old.  The staff was great and very helpful with anything we asked about.  More of a business hotel than a family hotel, but we still found it comfortable and well located.  Getting to Chinatown and Fisherman's Wharf was easy!

review.title: Great introduction to the fine hospitality of SF.
review.reviewText: Efficient check-in with our late arrival. Good room with comfortable beds. Breakfast buffet had good selection and quality foods. We were able to leave our many pieces of luggage secured for the day at this hotel while we enjoyed a full day bus tour of San Fransisco ! We returned to enjoy a great family supper together in the hotel restaurant. Thanks for a great introduction to the hospitality of your city.

review.title: perfect for what we needed
review.reviewText: The lounge was nice, the food was really good, the customer service was great...check in smooth and efficient, room very comfortable. The only disappointment was when we wanted to relax and soak in the hot tub is was full of children which of course is out of your control....suggestion.....maybe an additional spa area reserved for adults only, not sure if you can legally do that but sharing a hot tub with young kids under 10 years old screaming and splashing around makes it very hard to relax and enjoy which I am sure is your reasoning for offering the amenity in the first place.
review.positiveRemarks: location to airport was great, very comfortable room
review.negativeRemarks: hot tub restricted to persons over 16

review.title: Not a crowded location.
review.reviewText: Overall a relaxing hotel that met our needs. Spacious enough rooms with room for a chair.  A flat screen tv to view World Cup games. The microwave smelled and needed cleaning. Maid changed towels even though we hung the towels on the rack for reuse. And did not provide sufficient number of towels in exchange.
review.positiveRemarks: Enjoyed the warm cookies. Was the best. Comfortable room, bed and atmosphere. Not hectic pace.
review.negativeRemarks: Not all rooms had a microwave as advertised. Had to change rooms as a result. Pool is small. Workout area small mad only cardio equipment.
review.locationRemarks: Only business park nearby and not much nearby. Within a five mile drive is south SF which had your typical retail and food places.

review.title: Giants game
review.reviewText: Close to the city and affordable.....nice rooms and friendly staff

review.title: Vacation California
review.reviewText: We had a nice visit Grammy this is a great place to stay close to downtown and other things

review.title: Nice & Quiet
review.reviewText: Convenient location next to freeway but still quiet and spacious and only minutes to downtown San Fran and even closer to airport. Need to have your own car or rental if staying more than an overnight

review.title: Beautiful views close to it all
review.reviewText: amazing hotel! Close to Fishermans warf, Golden Gate Bridge, bay bridge, if your going to explore the city perfect price and excellent hotel

review.title: Wonderfull
review.reviewText: Staff was relly friendly nice locates hotel nice view

review.title: Convenient hotel to stay at when flying out of SFO
review.reviewText: At check-in, the clerk upgraded us to a suite, which was very nice, since we had our son with us. We left our car in the parking lot for 16 days without any extra charge. It was a great first night before a 15 day vacation in Europe.
review.positiveRemarks: It was clean, safe. it had free airport shuttle and car parking.

review.reviewText: The customer service was excellent. The rooms were clean and comfortable. It was one of the best hotel experiences for my family and me.

review.title: Close to the airport
review.reviewText: Nice, clean hotel. The staff was very helpful and the shuttle to the airport was very convenient.
Nice property! I would consider staying there again.
Great staff from the desk to the restaurant and bar.

review.title: Often overbooked to relocate you into smaller room
review.reviewText: Never book this hotel just one or two days ahead, because you will just end up in a smaller room paying the same price. I booked a room with two-queen beds, but was told at the counter that the only similar room they had is the one with a king bed. They added a tiny little twin bed with a not-so-clean sheet, which was not comfortable either. Quite disappointed when your last night at San Francisco ended up on a small portable twin bed in the corner of a small room.
review.locationRemarks: nothing much, there is a restaurant.

review.title: great location for couples retreat
review.reviewText: During our short, but meaningful one night stay at the Doubletree, the mere design of the lobby really brought out the Hilton standard. We went on a Saturday and it was pretty crowded, but the gentlemen at the front desk gave us an upgrade to a bay view suite on the 8th floor, and that definitely made our stay more enjoyable. Staff was extremely, really took the time to ask and understand who we are and what our plans are. Rooms were very comfy, especially with the sleep number bed that made it better for us, since I prefer to sleep on a firmer bed and the exact opposite for the lady. Cleanliness was exceptional, not even a single hair on the ground, all amenities were fully functional. really, I didn't have one thing to complain about, and they gave us extra cookies when we departed =]

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Pretty good hotel if you have a car. A little bit far from SF but price is good.

review.title: SFO DoubleTree Airport NORTH
review.reviewText: Enjoyable stay at SFO airport hotel with dining room worthy of destination hotel. Warm greeting on arrival, welcome cold lemon water next to front desk and the traditional warm chocolate cookie at check-in. But, unusual for an airport hotel in my experience, an excellent on-site restaurant with delicious appetizers and entrees, friendly bartenders and a well stocked bar, including Chambord for a French martini and 20 year port!
review.positiveRemarks: Accommodating front desk staff, very clean, modern rooms, plenty of convenient charging outlets, airport shuttle service, friendly housekeeping staff.
review.locationRemarks: The hotel is on the shore of the San Francisco bay with walking paths that are just outside the bar and worth a visit.

review.title: Disappointing
review.reviewText:
We were a $100 to $130 round trip cab ride from downtown. The hotel, restaurant, rooms,
were all acceptable but not exceptional.
review.positiveRemarks: The staff were all very nice
review.locationRemarks: Nothing near by except the airport

review.title: Awesome bed!!
review.reviewText: Cushy soft comfy bed!!! Hotel staff was nice, no breakfast which was disappointing but overall I would go back!!
review.negativeRemarks: Add a continental Breakfast
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is a beautiful place, the bay views, seeing the Sea Lions at Pier 39 also should be on your to do list

review.title: Best hotel in my trip.
review.reviewText: Excellent environment. Room was super clean. The lobby was excellent. The only problem I faced is about breakfast. It should be included.

review.title: Not the radisson
review.reviewText: You need to know that it is not the radisson hotel. We wasted time looking for radisson but it is now double tree.
review.negativeRemarks: There was no hot water in the shower

review.title: Nice hotel
review.reviewText: Was abit noisy from hwy traffic but overall was a really nice hotel with great food and good portions with great staff. Would come back again.

review.title: GOOD HOTEL!
review.reviewText:
STAFF WAS VERY NICE, FAST SERVICE NO COMPLAINTS.
I LOVE THIS HOTEL CUZ IT WAS JUST 10MIN AWAY FROM S.F. DOWNTOWN AND SO CLOSE FROM AIRPORT AS WELL... PARKING ALWAYS AVAILABLE, NICE CLERK, AND GOOD CLEANING SERVICE.

review.title: San Francisco splurge
review.reviewText: This hotel is really nice. We asked for a room on one of the higher floors but because we booked through Expedia, they gave us a room on the second floor, which has happened to us in the past. The bed was super comfortable. The on-site restaurant has floor to ceiling windows which allows for a great view of San Francisco Bay.
review.positiveRemarks: The hotel offers free shuttle service to and from the airport.
review.negativeRemarks: The indoor pool was too cold to swim in and the hot tub had too much chlorine which made our skin itchy. The windows were dirty.
review.locationRemarks: You will need a rental car if you plan to see attractions like the Golden Gate Bridge and the cable cars.

review.title: nice place to stay
review.reviewText: our experience was really good. the room was exactly what we wanted-very comfortable with amenities such as in room fridge, coffee maker, microwave, roomy closet and big chair for relaxing.
review.positiveRemarks: the best thing about this hotel was the staff. Jonas was extremely friendly and funny
review.negativeRemarks: the only improvement I could recommend would be some refurbishing of the carpets and drapes. they did look a little worn
review.locationRemarks: this hotel is located close to the 101, so it was easy to get around in a car. downtown was fun and it was easy to get to the golden gate bridge

review.title: Nice and comfortable hotel close by SFO airport.
review.reviewText: Hotel staff members provided excellent service. They made sure customers were well looked after.
review.positiveRemarks: The shuttle bus to and from SFO airport made things a lot easier and convenient for our stay.
review.locationRemarks: Easy to get to downtown San Francisco by taking the hotel shuttle to SFO airport where we use BART Rapid Transit connection.

review.title: Nice Hotel and close to the Airport.
review.reviewText: We enjoyed our short stay at this hotel. The room was very comfortable, but we thought that they should have included breakfast. However, having the shuttle take us to the airport was great!
review.positiveRemarks: We enjoyed the pool and the walk by the bay that was close by.
review.negativeRemarks: Breakfast if it was included in the price, would have been a nice touch.

review.title: Decent hotel just outside SF
review.reviewText: I've stayed at this hotel in the past and for the money it's a decent buy. There's a free shuttle to the airport where you can take BART into the city. My complaints would be slow internet, no nearby (walking distance) eateries or stores outside the hotel and facilities needs some updates. During my stay there the jacuzzi was not working, the pillows were very thin, there was a gash in the carpet in our room and the ac/heat unit can get loud.
review.positiveRemarks: Price and proximity to the city.
review.negativeRemarks: Slow internet connection, no HD channels (really what's the point of a flatscreen tv with no hd channels), better maintenance of the pool facilities.
review.locationRemarks: Nothing within walking distance really.

review.title: Nice hotel with free parking - near the airport.
review.reviewText:
Check in was very efficient - the staff is very efficient and friendly. Upon entering the spacious and welcome reception area, you are offered a warm chocolate chip cookie with nuts.

The location is located right off route 101 and very easy to get around to travel around the San Francisco area. Beautiful flowers and nice landscaping - the bed was so very comfortable and the room decor is very pleasant.
review.positiveRemarks: We got a great price and I loved the bird of paradise flowers and plants - the parking was easy and plentiful. Great location - easy to get to and ea
review.negativeRemarks: I am very happy with the quality of the hotel.
review.locationRemarks: San Francisco is a great city with lots to do. The park area is fantastic - I recommend starting at the Visitors Bureau right by the hwarf area

review.title: GREAT LOCATION, PEACEFUL AND QUIET AREA
